title: National Means Cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)
description: The Centrally Sponsored Scheme 'National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)' was launched in May 2008.

title: Inspire Scholarship
description: Microsoft INSPIRE aims to encourage meritorious students to study basic and natural sciences at undergraduate level.

title: Sitaram Jindal Scholarship
description: Sitaram Jindal Scholarship is considered a very beneficial scholarship program sponsored by Sitaram Jindal Foundation.

title: Aditya Birla Scholarship Programme
description: The aspirational Aditya Birla Scholarship Programme accords significant financial support.
